column.name: soundingid
column.comment: autoincrement field we will use to identify records

column.name: id
column.comment: WMO or WBAN id (general 4-6 digits)

column.name: idflag
column.comment: Flag to indicate if id is WMO,WBAN or other

column.name: dateflag
column.comment: Flag to indicate what type of date is being used

column.name: date
column.comment: date of the form yyyymmddhhhh

column.name: locflag
column.comment: Flag to indicate type of location/elevation

column.name: lat
column.comment: Latitude  in degrees, to hundredths

column.name: lon
column.comment: Longitude in degrees, to hundredths

column.name: elv
column.comment: Elevation in whole Meters

column.name: source
column.comment: Indicates source of data

column.name: obtype
column.comment: type of observation i.e. raob, pibal,..

column.name: nlevels
column.comment: total number of levels in the sounding/report

column.name: sfcindex
column.comment: index of surface level in tsr sounding, from TSR header

column.name: format
column.comment: reanalysi header format

column.name: vrsnsrc
column.comment: source version number of the format 1.00

column.name: unitsws
column.comment: original units of the wind speed ... value from TSR header + 1

column.name: unitsm
column.comment: original moisture variable ... value from TSR header + 1

column.name: merge_sids
column.comment: list of v2.0 soundingids which were merged to the soundingid identified by soundingid at top of this table

column.name: hyd_check
column.comment: hydrostatic check flag creatd by DSS

column.name: wind_check
column.comment: wind check flag

column.name: data
column.comment: string containing data, either a raob or a pibal
